title: Calculating Probabilities
text: The procedure to find the probability of something is as follows: First find the total number of possible outcomes for your situation. Second, find the total number of outcomes where your situation matches the one you want. Finally, divide your number acquired in the second step of this procedure by the first number, and you have the probability of your desired situation occuring.
